Annual Report 2017 / Resources Prima Group Limited

DIRECTORS’ STATEMENT

Share options and share awards (cont’d)

The Remuneration Committee (“RC) is responsible for administering the Scheme and the Plan. At the date of this statement, the members of the RC are Khoo Song Koon (Chairman) and Chow Wai San.

No share options were granted or released or vested pursuit to the Scheme for FY2017 and no options were outstanding at 31 December 2017.

In respect of the Plan, 147,000,000 share awards, the details of which are noted below, were granted during
